document.title: Upper Teeth Alignment with Clear Aligners
document.summary: We'll be using clear aligners to gently straighten your upper teeth over about 4–6 months. Most of your progress will be checked remotely, so you'll have fewer in-office visits. Extensive attachments will help guide the alignment process. Plus, whitening is included to brighten your smile!
next_steps: Begin treatment with initial aligner fitting
